div.style: display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;
display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
spod_get(
type = 'origin-destination',
zones = 'districts',
dates = c(start = '2020-02-14', end = '2020-02-21') )

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
spod_convert(
type = 'origin-destination',
zones = 'districts',
dates = c(start = '2020-02-14', end = '2021-05-09') )

div.style: display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;
display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p: dplyr functions: select(), filter(), mutate(), group_by(), summarise(), etc...

display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
For daily aggregated flows at munucipal level (2022 onwards)
get data from GraphQL API directly

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p: 'tbl' object with 'id' for origins and destinations and trip counts

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
Houlry flows and other data for a few days starting in 2020
get data from raw CSV.gz files

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
Analyse longer periods (several months)
or even the whole dataset over several years

span.p: spatial data matched by 'id' with aggegated mobility flows

display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
zones - polygons with zones in sf object
with 'id' that match with origins and destinations
